About Us

We Are British Council Approved!!


At TISAH, we recognize the complexities and opportunities that come with pursuing international education. Our team of seasoned education consultants has a proven track record of helping numerous students from around the world achieve their UK university dreams. We're dedicated to delivering personalized guidance and support, empowering every student to reach their full potential.
As a certified British Council Education Agent, we meet the highest standards of ethics and knowledge in student advising, with up-to-date training and compliance on UK study policies.

"We don’t just help you apply—we prepare you for the journey ahead."

Get Started

Our Mission & Visions

We're guided by core principles that ensure we always put students first.

Student-Centered

We prioritize each student's unique goals, challenges, and potential, crafting personalized pathways to academic success.

Integrity

We operate with complete transparency, providing honest guidance even when it means suggesting alternatives to a student's initial plans.

Excellence

We strive for the highest standards in our services, continuously updating our knowledge and improving our processes.

Our Services

Course & University Selection

Personalized guidance to help you find the perfect course and university based on your academic qualifications and career goals.

Learn more

Application Assistance

Complete support throughout the application process, including document preparation, personal statement reviews, and application submission.

Learn more

Visa Guidance

We do not offer Visa Guidance but we can refer you to trusted organizations who can help provide expert advice and support for your student visa application, ensuring you meet all requirements for studying in the UK.

Learn more
